TopicTitle: help updating from ver1.04.861 to current in Mac OS

Articles.Content:
Hi,

KSP has been dormant on my 'puter for so long.

I decided to attempt an update to the breaking ground version, but there appears to be no button to click for recent  updates. 

Can't seem to find a link to the update process.

Can someone point me in the right direction to help bring my KSP up to date? 

Thanks in advance.

 

Mike

Hi There!   Welcome to the forums!

Where did you buy the game?  Steam, GoG, KSP store?   Go to that service and re-acquire it from there.   All the downloads you need should be provided. 

Moved to BG support

I bought it from the KSP store.

I'll hunt for it.
